## Overview

This is a companion datapackage to the package *recountNNLS* package.
It contains a set of pre-computed features and model matrices to aid in the
computation of transcript abundances using *recountNNLS*. Currently the 
pre-computed read lengths are 37bp, 50bp, 75bp, 100bp, and 150bp.
